publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3006 Murdo Fraser: Perthshire Gardens Collectionâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of the Perthshire Gardens Collection; congratulates all of the nine gardens involved in this new initiative on developing this innovative approach to marketing these gardens as attractions and as an excellent means of promoting Perthshire as a short break tourist destination, and wishes them a successful season. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Keith Harding*, Mary Scanlon*, John Young*

S1M-3006 Murdo Fraser: Perthshire Gardens Collection-That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of the Perthshire Gardens Collection; congratulates all of the nine gardens involved in this new initiative on developing this innovative approach to marketing these gardens as attractions and as an excellent means of promoting Perthshire as a short break tourist destination, and wishes them a successful season. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Mary Scanlon, John Young
S1M-3006 Perthshire Gardens Collection (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3006 Perthshire Gardens Collection (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3006 Perthshire Gardens Collection (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
